Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Just now, a mysterious message arrived on your terminal.'}
{3: 'When you open the mail, its attachment automatically launches. With it, garbled code suddenly fills the entire screen.'}
{3: 'Characters gradually emerge from the center of the flickering data stream, forming two phrases—'}
{1: '>>>>>Gray Raven Commandant<<<<<', 2: '47f57fff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 7: '-4', 10: '1'}
{1: '>>>>>Please help me :(<<<<<', 2: '47f57fff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'Following the text, a set of coordinates appears, pointing to the lower levels of Babylonia.'}
{3: 'The security protocol activates automatically, firmly logging the coordinate parameters before the attachment deletes itself.'}
{3: 'When you start reading the email itself, there is only one brief message—'}
{1: '"Come alone"', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory952.png', 7: '-4', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory175.png'}
{3: "The coordinates take you through the winding paths of the lower-level warehouses. In the dim lights, the building's structure appears as complex as a maze."}
{3: 'At the end of the path, a burst of electronic static suddenly emanates from the room nearby.'}
{2: '(Enter the room cautiously)', 3: '20'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory453.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{3: 'As soon as you enter the room, the iron door behind you suddenly slams shut, its thunderous sound echoing through the pitch-black space.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Ahem—well hello there. I've heard a lot about you, Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A nearby TV suddenly flickers to life, revealing a figure shrouded in static on the screen as a digitally distorted voice emerges from the speaker.'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "I am the Wandering Hacker, wandering through the galaxy. I'm in a good mood today, so let's play a little game!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: 'In this room lies a "lucky" hostage from Babylonia, bound and restrained.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{3: "Peering into the darkness, a dim silhouette becomes visible. The urge to step closer and get a better look at the hostage's face proves irresistible."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "Freeze! Stay right where you are. I've rigged this entire floor with explosives. Take one more step forward, and I'll blow a massive hole right through Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "As for you and the hostage? I'm afraid you'll both end up as space debris, trailing behind my exhaust fumes on an endless journey through the stars.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you want from me?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "You need to answer one question. I'll let you and the hostage leave safely if I'm happy with your answer.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the question?", 3: '43'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: '—What significant event happened on this day in history?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: 'You only get one chance to answer that question.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Countless events have happened on any given day in history... This question is way too vague.'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: 'Quick! No hesitation—tell me the first answer that comes to your mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ancient Norman 6 was announced.', 3: '49', 4: 'The dormitory area had a 10-hour blackout.', 5: '52', 6: 'Yes.', 7: '55'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{2: '???', 3: "Pfft... So a promotional video is all they came up with, huh? They probably haven't even created a project folder yet."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{2: '???', 3: "...Ugh, it still makes me mad thinking about it. All the cherry cheese bubble tea I'd stocked in the fridge went bad that day."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Did it crash? Lol.'}
{3: 'Did you just hear... something behind you?'}
{3: 'Just then, another sharp electronic sound emanates from the TV—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "Ahem, I'm afraid that's WRONG!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: "Uh-oh, Gray Raven Commandant, guess I'll have to blow up a few things now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Wandering Hacker?', 3: 'BOOM—!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory368.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{3: 'A bright light suddenly floods the room... revealing a space adorned with colorful banners, balloons, and plush toys. Decorations of every kind fill the entire space.'}
{3: 'A massive "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" banner catches your eye in the center of your view, and beneath it stands the "hostage"—'}
{3: 'A projection of... Teddy, covering her mouth while grinning mischievously...?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'One of the most important things that happened on this day in history...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A playful whisper reaches your ears. As you turn around, you see the pink-haired Construct right behind you.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Is your birthday, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She holds a cake adorned with snow-white frosting in her left hand that is decorated with an adorable little bear drawn in pink jam.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I added my security clearance to your terminal last time I was in your office. That's what made it so easy for me to hack it this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Did I get you back there with that little drama?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not at all. I knew it was you from the start.', 3: '84', 4: 'I was scared soulless.', 5: '89'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh, is that so? So I didn't just see you jump out of your skin just now, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It was just because of the flash...', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh? But that's not what the recording shows...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'That camera right there caught the look on your face perfectly!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy smirks mischievously as she glances at a camera in the corner.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'But hey, I just so happened to have heard about this Wandering Hacker who offers data deletion services.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'And you just have to pay them in...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cherry-flavored electrolyte?', 3: '95'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, what do you say? Want to ask the Wandering Hacker for her help?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Help me, Wandering Hacker, you're my only hope...", 3: '98', 4: 'The Wandering Hacker can keep the recording as a memento.', 5: '99'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Alright, alright. The Wandering Hacker has heard it, and she has a little surprise prepared for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh? Well, how would you like another little something from the Wandering Hacker?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy meets your gaze, takes a small step forward, raises her right arm, and then—'}
{3: 'Snap—she snaps her fingers in the air.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '1'}
{3: "The room's lights dim, and soft, soothing music begins to play."}
{3: 'Colorful ornaments spin in the air, their light diffused and dreamy, transforming the space into something reminiscent of a dance floor at night.'}
{3: "—This intimate candlelit ball is the Wandering Hacker's gift to you."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've heard that you're always very busy around this time every year, and you always forget your birthday.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Well, what do you know? I happen to have a very good memory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So... shall we make a promise?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "From now on, there'll always be a certain hacker who remembers your birthday, just as reliably as a program that reminds you of all your appointments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Every year on this day, no matter what happens, she'll come to you and tell you—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Happy Birthday.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Teddy.', 3: '118'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'And in exchange—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The cake is slowly lifted up, its white candles bright and gleaming, its flames dancing in the air.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Going forward, share some of your wishes and luck with me each year on this day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Shh, don't blow them out just yet.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She puts a finger to her lips to make a hushing gesture.'}
{3: "The candlelight glimmers brightly, illuminating the mischievous look on the Wandering Hacker's face. Your reflection sparkles in her pink eyes."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Time to blow out the candles together!', 4: '1'}
